presentation_text: I am Michele Monteferrante, a software developer with training and experience in designing and developing technological solutions. Passionate about innovation, I am ready to put my skills at the service of ambitious projects.
sourceGitHub: Visit the source code on GitHub.

experienceList.description: Worked in a team for the development of a PLC Simulator with Backend in C# and Java, using .NET and Spring Frameworks. These backends use the OPC Unified Architecture structure, exposing REST APIs and a Web Socket for data exchange with a React.js Frontend.

formationList.graduation: High School Diploma in Applied Sciences
formationList.description: Scientific high school diploma with option in Applied Sciences.

Completed courses in:
- Object-Oriented Programming with Python
- Programming in JavaScript/TypeScript
- Java programming up to Java Enterprise development
- Developing dynamic websites with frameworks such as Flask, Spring, and React
- Introduction to fundamental concepts of Big Data and Machine Learning.

projectList.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projectList.text: This project allows you to play the classic game of tic-tac-toe directly through a web page, with a Python Flask backend and a JavaScript frontend.

projectList.title: Expense-Manager
projectList.text: Application for expense management, with a backend developed in Python Flask and a frontend developed in HTML5 and JavaScript.

projectList.title: HWreq
projectList.text: Exercise projects on data structures in Python.
